# RtError from RtAudio 4.0.12 from http://www.music.mcgill.ca/~gary/rtaudio/
project (RtError CXX C)
SET(TARGET_NAME "RtError")
IF(SUPPORT_AUDIO AND NOT STK_FOUND AND ( ALSA_FOUND OR (APPLE AND COREAUDIO_FOUND AND COREFOUNDATION_FOUND)))
	#add_custom_target(${TARGET_NAME})
	#IF(CMAKE_CAN_APPEND_PROPERTIES)
    	#	set_property(TARGET "${TARGET_NAME}" APPEND PROPERTY INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
	#ENDIF()
	#SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES("${TARGET_NAME}" PROPERTIES FOLDER "${FOLDERNAME}/${TARGET_NAME}")
	MESSAGE("[X] ${TARGET_NAME}")
ELSE()
	MESSAGE("[ ] ${TARGET_NAME}")
ENDIF()
